settings.html:
Come for the weight loss, stay for the health benefits


ProLon’s precision nutrition technology is clinically proven to keep you in a fasting state while nourishing your body with food. Our goal is to help reset your body's ability to rejuvenate from within — in just five days.

settings.title: It’s all in the science
settings.description:
Over 20 years of extensive preclinical and clinical studies sponsored by the National Institutes of Health (NIH) and conducted at the Longevity Institute and Diabetes and Obesity Research Institute of The University of Southern California (USC) resulted in the development of the first FMD® (ProLon®) which:

• Helps kickstart weight loss*, and supports healthy metabolic health and rejuvenation from within

• Triggers autophagy - the clean-up of cellular debris

• Helps reduce visceral fat for a trimmer waistline

settings.html:
Driven by the desire to livea longer, healthier life.


ProLon’s precision nutrition technology is clinically proven to keep you in a fasting state while nourishing your body with food. Our goal is to help reset your body's ability to rejuvenate from within — in just five days.

settings.title: Dr. Valter Longo, Ph.D
settings.description:
Dr. Valter Longo is the Director of the Longevity Institute at the University of Southern California. He is the grandfather of the science of fasting and was named by TIME among the top 50 most influential people in Health.

For the Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD), Prof. Longo was awarded the first patent in history for Healthspan. He discovered first how cells sense food and then devised the fasting mimicking formulation, and finally conducted mouse and human trials to test the health benefits of the Fasting Mimicking Diet (FMD).

settings.tag: Dana- ProLon user
settings.title: I really enjoyedmy ProLon experience
settings.description: The soups and bars were good and I learned a ton about myself and my eating habits. I tried ProLon to get rid of some inflammation in my body, and am very happy with the results. This feels like a great reset and I'm looking forward to a healthier future. I would do it again!

settings.title: I can’t recommend ProLon enough
settings.details:
I discovered ProLon last January and I have been doing it consistently ever since then. It is a really great reset for your body, especially 
after holidays. It has so many different benefits, it curbs sugar cravings and helps me manage
portion control.
settings.name: -WHITNEY

settings.title: Go ProLon... I'm obsessed!
settings.details: I started ProLon and i'm telling you, it worked! I lost 6 pounds, I have no brain fog, I absolutely do not crave sugar right now which is insane and I actually feel amazing, I'm full of energy! I am so proud of myself, my husband did it with me, he lost 5 pounds, says he has never felt better.
settings.name: -CAROLINE

settings.title: No more belly bloat...
settings.details: How are you going to feel after 5 days... Amazing! No belly bloat, you are going to lose weight, have more energy, and all your cravings for sugar... GONE! You have to give this a try.
settings.name: -AUDREY

settings.title: Reasons why I love ProLon..
settings.details: ProLon resets my gut (especially when I’ve been traveling), it helps me sleep better, and it allows me to take a break. These are three of the reasons why I love ProLon. I’ve done it for over four years and I only talk about things that I love.
settings.name: -TINX
